text: Morning Samantha! Hope you're doing very well. I'm here if you have some question. I'll try to respond as soon as I can but remember I'm still at work so I might take slightly longer to get back.

Hi Mariano, it nice to meet you! :smile: Sorry for the late reply, I was out all day looking at uni for masters ^^; so I haven't had a chance to sit down and reply. But thank you so much for offering your assistance. I'm currently, studying at Coventry University BA Illustration and Animation in my final year :slightly_smiling_face: I asked if it was okay to have some assistance as for my FMP we have to get feedback from industry on our work. (Which well...there isn't much of it yet cuz I just started ^^;), if any help with that is possible that would be great!

But I also have additional questions if thats okay as is it okay to ask about your background within animation? :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks, Samantha
